remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了中的从零开始索引在中单击的列的类控件。The class provides the zero-based index within the class of the column that is clicked in the control. 你可以在事件处理程序中使用此信息事件，以确定所单击的哪一列在列中数据上执行任务。You can use this information in an event handler for the event to determine which column is being clicked to perform tasks on the data within the column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
